title: The secret mission to save LGBT Afghans
description: Bella, Ali and Ahmed are trying to make the best of life in the UK after escaping the Taliban.

title: Is hay fever getting worse in the UK?
description: Experts say that climate change could lengthen hay fever season and increase pollen potency.

title: Abortion in US: How misinformation has fuelled the debate
description: Claims about health concerns and legal rights are intensifying the strength of feeling.

title: Grace Victory: 'Three months in a coma has taught me how to live'
description: Grace Victory says being in a coma due to Covid, just after giving birth, has changed her outlook.

title: Thai cave rescue: Meeting saved footballers four years later
description: One of the 12 boys talks about his life following the dramatic rescue that made headlines in 2018.

description: BBC Africa Eye has tracked down the ultra-violent bandit warlords who are raiding villages and abducting schoolchildren across north-western Nigeria.

description: Hundreds joined Nicola Roberts, Cheryl and Nadine Coyle in London's Hyde Park for memorial run.

title: Cricket Scotland board resigns over racism report
description: A review due to be published on Monday is expected to say there is institutional racism in the game.

title: Ukraine war: Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov seeks Arab world's support
description: Sergei Lavrov is in Egypt as Moscow counters international anger over the war in Ukraine.

description: Hundreds of people wore pink and ran around the London park in memory of Sarah Harding.

description: More than 3,000 people have been evacuated as the wildfire rages near Yosemite National Park.

title: Climate protesters dragged away after attempting glue stunt with Botticelli masterpiece
description: The incident follows a spate of action where environmental activists have targeted famous artworks.

description: It's one of the greatest mysteries in the animal kingdom - how do sea turtles navigate?

description: The studio announced a bumper crop of superhero films at Comic-Con - including Wakanda Forever.

title: Neighbours: Margot Robbie to return for TV soap finale

description: Watch as Great Britain win bronze in the men's 4x100m relay - as Canada take gold and the United States silver at the World Athletics Championships in Oregon.

title: Tory leadership: Truss and Sunak promise crackdown on migration
description: The Tory leadership candidates' pledges include extending the Rwanda plan and capping refugee numbers.
